messages.title: FOR PARLIAMENT
messages.content: Jack and his family live in the centre of St Albans. Jack is a daily commuter, working for a firm of chartered accountants in London. He is a central figure in St Albans Green Party, helping to move the party into third place across the district, ahead of Labour. He is also involved in Transition St Albans, which aims to make our city more sustainable in the face of climate change and the end of cheap oil.

messages.title: FOR ST ALBANS COUNCIL
messages.content: Simon was raised in central St Albans, and lives here now with his family. He is a freelance writer. He campaigns constantly to help residents, and to promote the best new ideas for improving the city. He is now in a strong position to become St Albans' first Green councillor.

issues.environment: Transition St Albans aims to make our city more sustainable in the face of climate change and the end of cheap oil.

images.caption: Simon Grover for St Albans Council
